html:
12.8.18  11:49 pm   How do you confront something that you haven't confronted or even thought of confronted in a long time that may end badly 

     you may want to get some very strong and durable pants

12.8.18  11:37 pm   Honestly i'd find it worth it to wait 6 weeks if it means more reality videos

     yes, but, would it be worth it for me for everyone to think i'm 'dead' or have 'quit' for that entire time

12.8.18  11:36 pm   Hey bill, congrats on the podcast appearance; it was very interesting getting to see you in that setting. Given that and your latest videos, what's the current plan going forward?

     i can't tell you

12.8.18  11:33 pm   How many backwards videos do I have to watch before I can speak backwards?

     -100

12.8.18  11:24 pm   Do your lyrics mean anything or are they just picked at random? 

     the goal is to construct the most meaningful song i possibly can

12.8.18  11:14 pm   I noticed that your "how to win at spelling" video is not up on your website yet.

     that's not true

      Will new content continue to be posted here? Thank you

     yes

12.8.18  10:28 pm   are you eventually gonna have a breakdown for working so much,

     it is going to be difficult to tell if the breakdown will be a result of working too much or working too little. because working too little has been proven to cause breakdowns

     or does this strict working schedule genuinely make you happy?

     it does, and unfortunately its strictness is momentarily in jeopardy

12.8.18  10:07 pm   should i take an ap class freshman year

     i'm not sure what that is

12.8.18  9:37 pm   What's the ideal length of a song?

     2:12

12.8.18  9:20 pm   What is your most favorite part about making videos?

      the part where i get to think of something and have it appear in someone else's mind

12.8.18  8:04 pm   when writing lyrics, what are you goals or ideas you like to do.

     have a fun good time making the song good, or fun

      or to phrase it another way, do the seemingly nonsensical or funny lyric in your songs make sense to you or are they just meant to be kinda random and silly.

     hopefully i can do a little better than that

12.8.18  8:01 pm   On piano I have been learning with scales and repertoire and such. In order to increase my dexterity what kinds of things do you think I should work on?

     i'm not sure ...... i think you should just play a lot. have fun. play songs. play parts of songs. make up songs . ..... do fun things ... i guess? fun is a turbo charger that may even be responsible for the creation of our universe

12.8.18  7:51 pm   do you ever feel like you're playing a character of yourself?

     rarely, and then i would adjust it to be more real if possible

12.8.18  6:35 pm   i think i'm an autistic savant, but my obsession and ability is social skill. in most situations i'm a masterful conversationalist. people don't understand how different i feel, and i can't even google this, and i don't know if it's even possible even though i feel it so strongly. i don't know what to do!

     seems like a good skill to have. this can be a good career skill

12.8.18  6:22 pm   ever been in a storm?

     i am usually the storm

12.8.18  5:06 pm   why isn't your spelling video on your wedsite 

     it is

12.8.18  4:54 pm   can you answer a question with a period at the end.

     sure

12.8.18  4:23 pm   are you insane?

     yes

12.8.18  2:39 pm   Any particular reason you prefer traditional grip?

     i switched when i was 11 due to a minor basketball injury

12.8.18  2:24 pm   in 'the moon is made of cheese', you really did cram a 3 syllable word (colorful) in a single note, didn't you? At first I thought you said "a cool shade shade of turquoise", then now I can only hear "purple shade of turquoise" even though that doesn't make sense. I definitely don't hear "colorful" though. What gives?

     sounds like i didn't sing it clearly enough

12.8.18  2:20 pm   What's your favorite piece of music you have made

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

12.8.18  2:20 pm   how do you make a thing

     put some pieces together

12.8.18  2:13 pm   Why don't you watch your videos after you make/upload them?

     too scary

12.8.18  2:09 pm   The moment you stop, will you break?

     maybe

12.8.18  1:56 pm   Why do I do the stuff I'm not supposed to do instead of the stuff I'm supposed to do?

     sounds like you have some suppositions of your own

12.8.18  12:35 pm   did you notice / come up with that "the complete good spelling kit" has the exact same letters as "dog gets pickle on helmet" and then base your video titled "how to win at spelling" around that?

     no

12.8.18  12:32 pm   Do you like yourself?

     in some ways

12.8.18  11:42 am   Are you good at photography?

     somewhat but i'm not an expert

     Do you even take pictures of other things?

     yes

12.8.18  11:18 am   do you think i should stop procrastinating 

     at some point yes

12.8.18  11:12 am   what do you consider yourself

     casual

12.8.18  9:44 am   How come that you're with neotic, colorful, lightful editing style?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

12.8.18  9:39 am   If every object in the world had its own song, which object's song would you listen to?

     one of the pyramids of egypt

12.8.18  7:32 am   Can someone be naturally uncreative?

     no. creativity is natural

12.8.18  6:32 am   House it going.

     pretty good

12.8.18  5:43 am   i noticed that crime/jail/police is a (kinda subtle ongoing) motif in a lot of your songs/videos. why is that?

      for dramatic effect

12.8.18  5:40 am   How do you spend a day?

      being wistful

12.8.18  5:19 am   How do I ask you for anagrams? 

     go to the scramble page and make a request

12.8.18  4:53 am   Why does it seem like my mind controls what I do and I can't choose what my mind wants to do? I can't do the things that people want me to do and everyone always tells me I have so much potential that I'm using on dumb stuff. How do we overcome what society wants from us and just focus on being ourselves and embracing our uniqueness?

      it seems there is a dispute going on amongst your mind, your self, and society ..... but from your description it doesn't seem clear which you would prefer to follow

12.8.18  4:49 am   12.7.18  3:36 pm Would that estimation stay the same when you take into account the superpowers you've acquired thanks to the 2 week schedule?

     i may have lost them but we'll see

12.8.18  4:40 am   is your lack of capitalization a rebellion against perfection? 

     no, is yours

12.8.18  4:11 am   What's your favorite flavour of chips?

     circus unicycle

12.8.18  4:11 am   how to i keep the bursts of motivation and inspiration I randomly get, everyday? 

     write down what the essence of it was

12.8.18  4:00 am   how do I stop viewing work as work? it leads to heavy procrastination on my part.

     you must learn to enjoy it, or find other work that you enjoy

12.8.18  3:38 am   favorite polyhedron? 

     dot

12.8.18  3:16 am   was the "fake jail" post on instagram something related to the cancelled song?

     cancelled video, not song

12.8.18  1:39 am   how do i stop comparing myself to everyone else? i once cried for hours after i got one question wrong on a math test because i thought i would get a bad grade and everyone would see me as inferior. i guess what i'm asking is how to stop thinking that your worth is dependent on your abilities.

     it might be useful to remember that there are many people who have crazy abilities but can't seem to find success

12.8.18  1:27 am   was your podcast interview sponsored by adidas

     that would be convenient but no. i feel like i should try to blank out the logo on this hat. it is my best hat but i am not sponsored by the company

12.8.18  1:10 am   i think im scared to try because ill learn my best isnt good enough

     your best only gets better with more tries

12.8.18  1:01 am   since you started the 2 week thing, have you scrapped any songs?

     besides this week no

12.8.18  12:31 am   can you make an anagram out of this question?

     yes but not on this page
